# display

**Type Property**

A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.

## Declaration

```swift
static var display: NSView.Invalidations.Display { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this invalidation type to set [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/needsDisplay] so that a change in property value triggers the system to redraw the containing view’s content.

## Types of Invalidations

- **constraints**: A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.
- **intrinsicContentSize**: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.
- **layout**: A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.
- **restorableState**: A change that invalidates the restorable state of the view.
